item.title: zsh配置
item.description: ZSH 配置 安装zshsudo apt install zsh 或者 sudo yum install zsh 安装oh-my-zshwget https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh -O - | sh 手动安装插件 1 2 git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions 运行 zsh 激活 zsh插件管理 安
